title: An Ultra-Detailed 64 Graphics Card Value Analysis (November, 2021)
description: SPONSOR: Check out LG Tone Free earbuds! [US]  [UK]   The used graphics card market is HOT right now, but for disappointing reasons. Let's talk about current price trends and how they stack up to previous figures we've logged.    Consider supporting us on Patreon!   SPONSOR: Snag an OEM Windows 10 Pro key and use code 'SKGS' for a 25% discount:   April, 2021 Price Analysis:  August, 2021 Price Analysis:   Excel spreadsheet data:   Shop new and used graphics cards:  Some AMD cards: RX 5500 XT:  RX 570:  RX 5600 XT:  AMD RX 5700 XT:  AMD RX 6800 XT:   Some Nvidia cards: Nvidia GTX 1060:  Nvidia GTX 1070:  Nvidia GTX 1080:  Nvidia RTX 2070:  Nvidia GTX 1080 Ti:  Nvidia RTX 3070:    My studio gear on Amazon: Sony a6600 (Primary):  Sony a6400 (Secondary):  2x Pixio PX277 Prime 165Hz IPS Monitors:  Neewer LED Lighting Kit:  Audio-Technica AT2035:  Yamaha MG10XU Mixer:  Neewer Microphone Arms:  Arrowzoom Sound-Damping Foam Panels:    Follow me on social media: TWITCH:  FACEBOOK:  TWITTER:  INSTAGRAM:    Join our public Discord server:   DISCLOSURES: All Genius links are tied to our Amazon Associate account, from which we earn a small sales commission. Links containing a 'bit.ly' reference forwarding to Newegg are tied to our Rakuten account, from which we earn a small sales commission. All sponsored links and comments will contain the word "SPONSOR" or "AD." Any additional revenue stream will be disclosed with similar verbiage.  #GraphicsCard #Market
